name: richly
content:
richly decorated, furnished, etc.
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a lot of beautiful or expensive decoration, furniture, etc.: The façade of the church is richly decorated in green and white marble.
See more
in a very special or valuable way, or in a way that is greater than usual: The cake takes two hours to cook, but your patience will be richly rewarded. She finally obtained the recognition which she so richly deserved.
